	#include<iostream>
	#include<algorithm>
	using namespace std;
	int gcd(int a,int b)
	{
		if(b>a)
			swap(a,b);

		if(b==0)
			return a;
		else
			return gcd(b,a%b);
	}
	int main()
	{
		int t;
		cin>>t;
		while(t>0)
		{
			int n,m,ans;
			cin>>n>>m;
			if(n==1 || m==1)
				ans=max(n,m);
			else
				ans=gcd(n-1,m-1)+1;	
			cout<<ans<<endl;
			t--;
		}	
	}
